I

IGeneralMessagingBetweenObjects - Interface in player
The main interface of the program, which can implement its methods in different classes, such as players or any other class that is created later in the program to send messages between objects.
InititClass - Class in <Unnamed>
This class is a initit class and prepares the program for further tasks with the help of its methods.
InititClass() - Constructor for class InititClass
 
instanceForCommunicationWithFile() - Static method in class comunicationInput.CommunicationWithFile
This method was created to build the Singleton object for this class.
IOTest - Annotation Type in testing
This notation is placed on any method and has the ability to take the name of the file or any other string as input.
IOTestClass - Annotation Type in testing
This annotation is placed on the class and as an input takes the name of the class to achieve the desired methods in the program.
IOTestRule - Class in testing
This class is designed to help reflect the desired method of the class on which the designed annotations are placed.
IOTestRule() - Constructor for class testing.IOTestRule
 

M

main(String[]) - Static method in class MainClass
The job of this method is to create an object from the InititClass class and call the main methods of the program.

message - package message
 
Message - Class in message
This class is used to create a message between two objects in the program.

MessageStatus - Enum in message
This enum class is not very efficient in this program in practice, but if the program wants to develop and the status of messages in different modes is important to us, then it is a good capability.

P

R

this method get receive message and make reply message
run() - Method in class player.MultiThreadPlayer
When an object implementing interface Runnable is used to create a thread, starting the thread causes the object's run method to be called in that separately executing thread.

S

satrtIntiatorPlayer() - Method in class InititClass
This method sends messages from the initiator as a thread (server) and receives messages from another player.
satrtOtherPlayer() - Method in class InititClass
This method is designed as a second Thread for the second player that receives messages from the initiator and returns the appropriate message.
